guideline: The contract should be a 2002 ISDA master agreement (92 not allowed)
The name of party A should be clearly defined
The name of party B should be clearly defined
Specified entity for party Party A should be none (not applicable)
Specified transaction scope should be standard
Specified indebtness for party A should include borrowed_money
Specified indebtness for party A should include deposits
threshold amount should be 3% of shareholder's equity for party A
Automatic Early Termination should be applicable at least to party A
Termination currency can be USD, EUR, GBP, JPY
Party A should be a multibrach party with offices in New-York and London
Governing Law should be English law or New-York law
